Entries.funReturn_Kenneth: {{Random: Man, I had a great day today. Everything in town is working smoothly.#$b#How was your day? I hope it was great, too!$h, Sorry if I smell a little burned. I had some wiring that caught on fire and the smell lingers.$s, Phew! I almost fell from the ladder when I was checking one of the lamps earlier!$u#$b#Turns out it was just Keahi. He accidentally bumped the ladder when Trinnie was chasing him.$6#$b#That was frightening!$s, I'm back. The town was pretty uneventful, but I almost turned my ankle coming off the ladder.#$b#I'll be more careful in the future, so don't worry., @, are you familiar with hobbits?#$b#Well, it's just... Maru was telling me a joke she wanted to tell Sabrina, but I don't think I really understood it.$4}}

{{Random: Man, I had a great day today. Everything in town is working smoothly.#$b#How was your day? I hope it was great, too!$h, Sorry if I smell a little burned. I had some wiring that caught on fire and the smell lingers.$s, Phew! I almost fell from the ladder when I was checking one of the lamps earlier!$u#$b#Turns out it was just Keahi. He accidentally bumped the ladder when Trinnie was chasing him.$6#$b#That was frightening!$s, I'm back. The town was pretty uneventful, but I almost turned my ankle coming off the ladder.#$b#I'll be more careful in the future, so don't worry., @, are you familiar with hobbits?#$b#Well, it's just... Micah was telling me a joke he wanted to tell Sabrina, but I don't think I really understood it.$4}}

Entries.Shiro: I'm curious to see what the girls are selling.#$b#But I think the guys will judge me if I went over and bought some of their stuff.$h#$e#I wonder what Sabrina is tinkering with over there, though.
